name: SBAHJ THE GMAE: ACT WON
description:
its here. its really bad. but more importantly, its free and released a couple hours before hiveswap. did i mention it was free? SBAHJ the GMAE is here and its free AND its ACT WON….its got ROMANCE. its got TRVIA. its got a half finished plotline. everything you could want and more!

game features such AS:

- 6 minutes of actual game play
- bad end
- obama
- things i forgot to fix but we can pretend theyre charming and meant to be that way
